001package edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity;
002
003import androidx.room.ColumnInfo;
004import androidx.room.Entity;
005import androidx.room.ForeignKey;
006import androidx.room.PrimaryKey;
007
008/**
009 * This class represents the stitches that make up a {@link Row}
010 */
011@Entity(
012    tableName = "row_stitch",
013    foreignKeys = @ForeignKey(entity = Row.class,
014        parentColumns = "row_id",
015        childColumns = "row_id")
016)
017public class RowStitch {
018
019  @PrimaryKey(autoGenerate = true)
020  @ColumnInfo(name = "row_stitch_id")
021  private long id;
022
023  @ColumnInfo(name = "row_id", index = true)
024  private long rowId;
025
026  @ColumnInfo(name = "ordinal_position", index = true)
027  private int ordinalPosition;
028
029  /**
030   * Gets the id for a particular {@link RowStitch}.
031   */
032  public long getId() {
033    return id;
034  }
035
036  /**
037   * Sets the id for a particular {@link RowStitch}.
038   */
039  public void setId(long id) {
040    this.id = id;
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * Gets the id for a particular {@link Row}.
045   */
046  public long getRowId() {
047    return rowId;
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * Sets the id for a particular {@link Row}.
052   */
053  public void setRowId(long rowId) {
054    this.rowId = rowId;
055  }
056
057  /**
058   * Gets the ordinal position for a particular {@link RowStitch}.
059   */
060  public int getOrdinalPosition() {
061    return ordinalPosition;
062  }
063
064  /**
065   * Sets the ordinal position for a particular {@link RowStitch}.
066   */
067  public void setOrdinalPosition(int ordinalPosition) {
068    this.ordinalPosition = ordinalPosition;
069  }
070}
